original: Tālapiṭṭhaṃ tathā dhotaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ yaṃ khīravalliyā;

niyyāsaḥ ucchu nibbattaḥ ekaḥ satta aha kāliko

original: Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā, khādanaṃ vāpi yo pana;

original: Thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, maṃse mānusake siyuṃ;

original: Sese akappiye maṃse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṃ.

original: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṃ pana vaḍḍhati.

vikāla paccayā vā api na dosaḥ yāmakālike
satta aha kālikam yāvajīvikam paṭigaṇhataḥ

ajjhohāra payogesu dukkaṭam tu nirāmise
